title: 79: What Could Polygraph Tests Mean For Alex's Trial?
description:
Alex's defense team files motions asking the prosecution to hand over some very interesting items.
We let you know what Alex's attorneys are asking for, why they might be asking, what the requests mean, and will the motions succeed.
Our legal analyst, John Snyder breaks down the motions.
Plus, one of the motions asks for "Cousin" Eddie Smith's polygraph results.
How will the results come into play during the trial.
We talk to a polygraph expert about how the polygraph works and if it's accurate.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:author: Matt Harris and Seton Tucker
